content.text:
I'm ready to help you explore the codebase and design implementation plans! I understand that I'm in a READ-ONLY mode where I can only explore and plan, not modify any files.

Let me get oriented with the environment first:

<function_calls>
<invoke name="bash">
<parameter name="command">pwd</parameter>
</invoke>
</function_calls>
<invoke name="bash">
<parameter name="command">ls -la /Users/patrick/workingdir/personal-agent</parameter>
</invoke>
</function_calls>
<invoke name="bash">
<parameter name="command">find /Users/patrick/workingdir/personal-agent -type f -name "*.md" | head -20</parameter>
</invoke>
</function_calls>

I can see this is a personal agent project with:
- A **Tauri desktop app** (`packages/desktop/src-tauri`)
- A **UI component** (`packages/desktop/ui`) built with React/TypeScript
- A **Go backend** (`go-backend`) handling agent logic and storage
- A **website** component

The recent git status shows active development on:
- Agent capabilities and settings UI
- Stateful agent implementation
- Database migrations and storage
- New tools: feedback, screenshot, onboarding
- Task scheduling features

I'm warmed up and ready! Please provide the requirements you'd like me to explore and design an implementation plan for. I'll thoroughly explore the codebase, understand existing patterns, and create a detailed plan - all without modifying any files.
